title: World Saving Operation
message: "This is a future. This is the last chance for the human race."
welcome_message: Welcome to the World Saving Operation
content_description: This is the starting screen of a global digital consciousness and justice system that will go live on May 19, 2025. It will be built on the brotherhood of peoples and a digital mission system.
simay_subtitle: Türkiye on the Path to World Leadership
simay_message: The Simay Movement is an initiative that carries humanity to a shared future, founded on brotherhood and justice.
simay_launch_date: May 19, 2025 - On the Path to World Leadership

feedback.title: Share Your Thoughts

manifesto.title: Simay Movement Manifesto
manifesto.introduction: As the Simay Movement, we aim to make the world a more just, peaceful, and sustainable place.
manifesto.conclusion: On Türkiye's path to world leadership, we want to guide humanity's future by upholding these values.
